column4: i have a problem when i have save my file on desktop and the i deleted it i can see the file name stil there on my desktop like i used to make a c programing and i have save with hola.c and then when i deleted it  but when i check it through terminal i can see hola.c~  file there
How to delet this file hola.c~ through my terminal is there any command
using ctrl-h in nautilus you can get hidden files to be shown, then you may delete it as usual.
